hudson.tasks.Shell.command: LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH cd trunk java -jar build.jar clean java -jar build.jar copyphoneme java -jar build.jar -DTRACING_ENABLED=true -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=true -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=true -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=true -DNATIVE_GC_ONLY=false java -jar build.jar -DTRACING_ENABLED=$TRACING_ENABLED -DASSERTIONS_ENABLED=$ASSERTIONS_ENABLED -DDEBUG_CODE_ENABLED=$DEBUG_CODE_ENABLED -DENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING=$ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLASSLOADING -DNATIVE_GC_ONLY=false -prod -mac -o2 -assume -tracing rom -strip:d -lnt -metadata cldc imp debugger /home/dw29446/bin/runsmoketest.sh /home/dw29446/bin/rundsmoketest.sh

project.description: Build a full debug build from SVN. Build with assertions, debude code, assume, tracing, and interpreted gc.
